alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 09 at 2:47PM CDT until July 10 at 11:40AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Canadian River at Norman affecting McClain and Cleveland Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Canadian River at Norman. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 95.0 feet, Flooding to depths of a foot occurs over areas along and near the river on the Cleveland-McClain County border from near Moore and at Norman... to areas near Noble. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 92.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 94.0 feet. - Forecast...The Canadian River is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 94.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 94.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM CDT.
